original_title: Mokoi Tekoá Petei Jeguatá – Duas aldeias, uma caminhada
overview: With no Forest left to hunt and no land to cultivate, the Maby-Guarani depend on the sale of their handcraft to survive. Three young Guarani filmmakers accompany the daily life of two comunities united by the same history, since the first contact with the Europeans until the intense coexistence with today’s White people.
title: Two villages, one single walk
